page.title: 07Transport(traffic count)
page.content:
On June 5th.we did traffic counts comparing the A1 with the B6403 (Ermine Street).The survey was done from 2.30pm. to 3.00pm.at both places. RESULTS {Cars Lorries Vans Others Total {A1} 226 260 50 5 541 {B6403 }64 14 14 0 92
This shows that the A1 is a extremely busy road.The time of the survey was not the peak time.The count would have been much higher had the survey taken place at 8.30am.or at 5.00pm. Perhaps the volume of traffic warrants expansion or even some form of relief road.
